Package com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILPDevice
    This interface defines device on which the application is running.
    ILPError
    An error describes a failure of an event to be processed by the server.
    ILPFilter
    A filter can determine the membership of any object in its domain within an implied.
    ILPGeopoint
    A geopoint is a coordinate in the physical world.
    ILPID
    An ID is an identifier of a Location Marketing object.
    ILPLocalNotification
    A local notification is a communication (generally marketing-related) sent from the server.
    ILPLocalNotificationListener
    A local notification listener receives updates concerning ILPLocalNotification.
    ILPLocalpointService
    The Location Marketing service is the applications's entry point to Location Marketing functionality.
    ILPLocation
    A location is an area of interest defined in the Location Marketing console.
    ILPLocationListener
    A location listener receives updates concerning locations .
    ILPLocationProvider
    A location provider acts as a store for locations deemed "relevant" by the SDK.
    ILPMessage
    A message is a communication (generally marketing-related) sent from the server.
    ILPMessageListener
    A message listener receives updates concerning messages.
    ILPMessageProvider
    A message provider acts as a store for messages deemed "relevant" by the SDK.
    ILPOrdering
    An ordering can determine the relative ordering of any two objects in a domain.
    ILPTag
    A tag describes a location.
    ILPUser
    The user of the Location Marketing service.
    ILPVersion
    A version describes the variant of the Location Marketing SDK installed in the application.
